name: PaceMachine
description:
Image-Upload is not available at the moment.
Cover and screenshot will follow seen!

My contribution to the Godot Wild Jam #30

Theme: Heartbeat
Wildcards: None, sorry :(
Development-time: 8 Days

You have to repair pacemakers. Drag'n'Drop missing parts from your inventory into the machine, start the simulation and see if you can get a steady heartbeat.

Browser-Version should work good on a decent PC. If the game jitters, or the physic is doing strange stuff, please try the executable.
